column4: hi, i need some help,  I have upgrade to gutsy but now I cannot change my monitor display resolution , to lower than 1280*1024, Is this some kind of bug
are you using an nvidia driver?
i had trouble setting resolutions and refresh rates.  I reported it, and was told that the nvidia driver has some bugs in it.
and i forgot, im using nvidia driver also, so maybe you have a similar problem
well, i can change the resolution, i just have trouble changing the refresh rate
